name: healthyfied chorizo sandwich
description: This healthyfied chorizo sandwich is perfect for anyone following a high-protein, low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. Featuring keto-friendly bread, exquisite Iberico chorizo, and creamy Kewpie mayo, it's an indulgent yet guilt-free option for health-conscious gourmets.

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the Iberico chorizo into thin slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the keto friendly bread until crispy and golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the Kewpie mayo evenly over one side of each slice of toasted bread.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Layer the sliced Iberico chorizo on one of the slices of bread, mayo side up.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Top the chorizo with the second slice of bread, mayo side down, to form a sandwich.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
